import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { SignUpAction } from "../Redux/Actions/Actions"; function NevbarComponent(props) { const [showLoginModeul, onShowLoginModeul] = useState(false); const [showSignupModeul, onShowSignupModeul] = useState(false); const [showDropdown, onShowDropdown] = useState(false); const [showManu, onShowManu] = useState(false); const [userDetails, setUserDetails] = useState(null); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { debugger if (props.SignUpData) { debugger setLoginUserDetails(props.SignUpData); } if (localStorage.getItem('UserDetails')) { setLoginUserDetails(localStorage.getItem('UserDetails')); } }, [props.SignUpData]) const onFormUpdate = (event) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); } const closeModel = () => { onShowLoginModeul(false); onShowSignupModeul(false); setFormData({}); } const signupSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() props.SignUpAction(formData) } const setLoginUserDetails = (details) => { if (details && details != 'undefined') { debugger localStorage.setItem('token', details.token) localStorage.setItem('UserDetails', JSON.stringify(details.result)) setUserDetails(details.result); } } console.log('userDetails', userDetails) return ( <>

) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { SignUpData: state.SignUpReducer.signUpDetails, } } const mapDispatchtoProps = { SignUpAction: (details) => SignUpAction(details), } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchtoProps)(NevbarComponent)
